message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for your business.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $2,000,000.

Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price of $2,000,000. I am willing to pay up to $1,500,000 for the product. Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.
